fields.name: ActiveLocation
fields.description: The Current active location of the PE.

fields.name: AllowedOperations
fields.description: The allowed operations on the Replication protected item.

fields.name: CurrentScenario
fields.description: The current scenario.

fields.name: EventCorrelationId
fields.description: The correlation Id for events associated with this protected item.

fields.name: FailoverHealth
fields.description: The consolidated failover health for the VM.

fields.name: FailoverRecoveryPointId
fields.description: The recovery point ARM Id to which the Vm was failed over.

fields.name: FriendlyName
fields.description: The name.

fields.name: HealthErrors
fields.description: List of health errors.

fields.name: LastSuccessfulFailoverTime
fields.description: The Last successful failover time.

fields.name: LastSuccessfulTestFailoverTime
fields.description: The Last successful test failover time.

fields.name: PolicyFriendlyName
fields.description: The name of Policy governing this PE.

fields.name: PolicyId
fields.description: The ID of Policy governing this PE.

fields.name: PrimaryFabricFriendlyName
fields.description: The friendly name of the primary fabric.

fields.name: PrimaryFabricProvider
fields.description: The fabric provider of the primary fabric.

fields.name: PrimaryProtectionContainerFriendlyName
fields.description: The name of primary protection container friendly name.

fields.name: ProtectableItemId
fields.description: The protected item ARM Id.

fields.name: ProtectedItemType
fields.description: The type of protected item type.

fields.name: ProtectionState
fields.description: The protection status.

fields.name: ProtectionStateDescription
fields.description: The protection state description.

fields.name: ProviderSpecificDetails
fields.description: The Replication provider custom settings.

fields.name: RecoveryContainerId
fields.description: The recovery container Id.

fields.name: RecoveryFabricFriendlyName
fields.description: The friendly name of recovery fabric.

fields.name: RecoveryFabricId
fields.description: The Arm Id of recovery fabric.

fields.name: RecoveryProtectionContainerFriendlyName
fields.description: The name of recovery container friendly name.

fields.name: RecoveryServicesProviderId
fields.description: The recovery provider ARM Id.

fields.name: ReplicationHealth
fields.description: The consolidated protection health for the VM taking any issues with SRS as well as all the replication units associated with the VM's replication group into account. This is a string representation of the ProtectionHealth enumeration.

fields.name: SwitchProviderState
fields.description: The switch provider state.

fields.name: SwitchProviderStateDescription
fields.description: The switch provider state description.

fields.name: TestFailoverState
fields.description: The Test failover state.

fields.description: The Test failover state description.
